page.title: 10SCHOOL CONSTRUCTION
page.content: The estimated cost of the new school was Â£365,000.However to date the cost is Â£380,000.The school took 15 months to build.It was completed 3 months ahead of schedule.The new school was built on the playing field of the old school. In October,1983,the field was drilled to test for mine shafts as the area had several coal mines.The steel structure,concrete foundations were completed between January-April,1984. The brickwork was completed by June, 1984,the roof erected by August,1984. There are 4 classrooms,a staffroom, an atrium,audio-visual room,junior cloakroom,infant cloakroom.Half of the hall is a classroom.We have morning service,our dinner,P.E. lessons in the hall.Our dinners are cooked in the school kitchen.The atrium is full of plants.
